system.requirement: Once you explore a precursor vault...

abilities.description: When you attempt to use the vortex to travel to the precursor era or to return to the present, @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.Item.e6ed148eff82c171]{Face Danger} (+wits). On a miss with a match, the time vortex is damaged beyond repair. The vortex requires roughly the same amount of time to recharge as your eidolon drive.
The vortex allows your sensors to see your current surroundings from any point in time it can travel to.
The vortex also allows you to travel to the distant future long after humanity's extinction.
